name: Cat Maker
description:
Draw a cat from scratch, or assemble one with parts!

Cat Maker provides you the power to create the cutest cat you can imagine! (Or the creepiest) You can either design your beloved creature by drawing or assembling ready-to-use cat parts. Fill your garden with lovely kittens and three-headed monsters.

Programming: Hefan, Racer404

Graphics: mashen, Yijia

Music & Sound effects: Lilin
